DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether tanezumab is effective in the treatment of pain associated with chronic prostatitis.
DOC.brief_title: An Efficacy And Safety Study Of Tanezumab For The Treatment Of Pain Associated With Chronic Abacterial Prostatitis
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of chronic prostatitis Male adults at least 18 years of age Moderate to severe chronic prostatitis, with an average pain score above a predefined level To use contraception. History of symptoms for less than 3 of the last 6 months History of recurrent urinary tract infections, or genitourinary cancer Use of finasteride or dutasteride within 6 months. History of hepatitis B, C or human immunodeficiency virus (HIV)
